metadata.title: CVE-2019-3572 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libming 0.4.8. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the function writePNG in the file util/dbl2png.c of thedbl2png command-line program. Because this is associated with an erroneouscall to png_write_row in libpng, an out-of-bounds write might occur forsome memory layouts.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
